description: Amendments to planning permission dated 27 March 2024 (RN: 23/08783/FULL) for the installation of new front and end-of-trip facilities entrances on Hanover Street; alterations to the internal atrium; replacement of roof structures and upgrading plant and creating new pavilion and terrace on the roof; introduction of a new mansard roof onto Hanover Street; infill extension on Princes Street at 5th and 6th floor; alterations to the Cupola; replacement of existing artwork; reorganisation of internal partitioning; and associated works; NAMELY, amended atrium access and maintenance housing, planting to pavilion facade and terrace updates, amendments to cleaning system to north facade, amendments to PVs, amendments to Princes Street extension, amendments to atrium, amendments to mansard roof, introduction of escape ladder at level 8, external pipework route, and cleaning and repair of facade.
